pages.text: Transforms a mundane broom into its magical equivalent. Brooms, including the mundane one, can also be used to sweep up various dusts.

pages.title: Cypress Broom
pages.text: Cypress Brooms cost magic power from a Grimoire Magia to maintain flight. They also give resistance 2 when mounted.

pages.title: Elder Broom
pages.text: Elder Brooms cost magic power from a Grimoire Magia to maintain flight. They are the fastest of the brooms, but do not have any special properties.

pages.title: Juniper Broom
pages.text: Juniper Brooms do not cost magic power to maintain flight, due to their magical nature. However, they are also quite slow.

pages.title: Dragon's Blood Broom
pages.text: A broom made from a dragonâ€™s blood tree, a sigil can be applied to the broom, and its effects will be applied to you while in flight. Also flies a bit faster than a normal broom, but not as fast as an Elder broom
